plot: A house bursts into flames. A man beats up a woman. A superhero intervenes. But by night his subconscious mind forces the superhero to challenge his passion radically.
title: The Burning Haus
plot_es: A house bursts into flames. A man beats up a woman. A superhero intervenes. But by night his subconscious mind forces the superhero to challenge his passion radically.
plot_en: A house bursts into flames. A man beats up a woman. A superhero intervenes. But by night his subconscious mind forces the superhero to challenge his passion radically.
